participant_1.background:
I used to be a teacher like my mom, but I found that I prefer working with animals more.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I enjoy watching my son play football and I like to make sure that things are done right, even if it means redoing them over and over again.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
when things go wrong , i do everything i can to make it right.

participant_2.background:
I spent a week in the Amazon Rainforest when I was younger, and it was the most amazing experience of my life.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.
I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts.
I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day.
i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!  I'm just sitting here writing stories while my son plays football in the backyard.

That sounds really relaxing.  I love writing, too!  I actually spent a week in the Amazon Rainforest when I was younger, and it was the most amazing experience of my life.  I wrote a whole book about it!
That's so cool!  I've always wanted to go to the Amazon Rainforest.  I'm glad you had such a great experience there.
Thanks!  It was amazing!  I'm so glad I got to experience it.
I hear it's really beautiful there.  What was your favorite part of the trip?
There were so many amazing parts of the trip, but I think my favorite part was seeing all of the different animals.  I saw monkeys, sloths, snakes, and even a jaguar!
It was really something else.  I'm so glad I got to experience it.
Me too!  I hope I can go there someday.
I hope you do, too!  It's an amazing place.
Thanks!  I'm sure I will someday.
